addr: 55 Church Street. 55th Floor. New York, NY 10007
title: Architects: Resiliency and Infrastructure Protection with CHP
desc:
Combined Heat and Power can provide a variety of services to a building, community, and overall electrical grid. These systems capture and make use of the thermal energy created during electric generation, making them more energy efficient while reducing greenhouse gas emissions. It is especially important for architects and engineers to have a keen understanding of this technology, how it can positively affect the resiliency of buildings & infrastructure they design and build, and know how to access available funding and technical resources. 
 This ? day lecture will include a 90 min discussion of this technology, how it supports resilient buildings and infrastructure, and an essential 30 min tour of a working facility so participants may see the actual scale and needs of such technology.? 
 Course Credit: AIA 2 LU/HSW PE NYS 2.0 PDH 
 Note that there are two sessions of this course.? If the session you're trying to book a ticket for is full, check the other session for availablity. 
 If?both events?are full please add your name to the waiting list to be contacted in the event of a cancellation.
